price: ߊ߬ ߝߘߊߣߍ߲߫ ߛߎ߬ߟߋ߬ߡߊ߯ߣߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫ ، ߊ߬ ߞߣߐߞߊ߲ ߠߋ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ : ߊߟߊ߫ ߕߐ߮ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߡߊ߬ߤߌ߬ߣߊ߬ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߤߌߣߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innahu min sulaymāna wa-innahu bis'mi al-lahi al-raḥmāni al-raḥīmi
